ResearchProjectDef.label: early oripathy diagnosis
ResearchProjectDef.description: Manufacture a device that can diagnose and track a person's oripathy symptoms.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->lost a loved one too soon due to the late diagnosis of oripathy.
subject_story->secured a trade deal for materials used to manufacture infection monitors
subject_story->stole a crate of infection monitors to distribute to the poor

ResearchProjectDef.label: oripathy suppressant production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce oripathy Suppressant, a drug that slows the progresion of oripathy.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->lectured to the Summit of Nations about oripathy treatment
subject_story->was driven out of Ursus as a quack, for selling a medicine that "doesn't do anything"
subject_story->managed an outbreak of oripathy through careful distribution of suppressant

ResearchProjectDef.label: frostnova
ResearchProjectDef.description: Prepare herbal medicine into frostnova, a mild analgesic.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->experimented with herbal medicine to help infected soldiers
subject_story->learned the recipe while traveling through the frozen wastes with a group of armed infected
subject_story->legalized frostnova for mass production across several coreworlds, when [ANYPAWN_pronoun] had the power to do so
